member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions
member.summary: Contains methods that extend the NTF's API when used from Silk4NET (this is the counterpart of the SilkTest.API assembly that extends the NTF API for the Workbench)

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageExists(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether the specified image exists.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageExists(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns whether the specified image exists.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
For which occurrence of the image the existence should be checked, if there are multiple results. The first occurrence is 1.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageExists(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,System.Int32,SilkTest.Ntf.Rectangle)
member.summary: Returns whether the specified image exists.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
For which occurrence of the image the existence should be checked, if there are multiple results. The first occurrence is 1.
The object-relative rectangle in which to search the image.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageRectangle(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the object-relative rectangle of the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
member.returns: the rectangle of the specified image

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageRectangle(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the object-relative rectangle of the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
For which occurrence of the image the existence should be checked, if there are multiple results. The first occurrence is 1.
member.returns: the rectangle of the specified image

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageRectangle(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,System.Int32,SilkTest.Ntf.Rectangle)
member.summary: Returns the object-relative rectangle of the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
For which occurrence of the image the existence should be checked, if there are multiple results. The first occurrence is 1.
The object-relative rectangle in which to search the image.
member.returns: the rectangle of the specified image

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageClick(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String)
member.summary: Clicks in the middle of the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageClick(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,SilkTest.Ntf.Point)
member.summary: Clicks on the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
The coordinates at which to click. The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the image. For clicking the middle of the image use ClickPosition.Center.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageClick(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,SilkTest.Ntf.Point,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clicks on the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
The coordinates at which to click. The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the image. For clicking the middle of the image use ClickPosition.Center.
Which occurrence of the image should be clicked, if there are multiple occurrences. The first occurrence is 1.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageClick(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,SilkTest.Ntf.Point,System.Int32,SilkTest.Ntf.ClickType)
member.summary: Clicks on the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
The coordinates at which to click. The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the image. For clicking the middle of the image use ClickPosition.Center.
Which occurrence of the image should be clicked, if there are multiple occurrences. The first occurrence is 1.
The desired mouse action.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageClick(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,SilkTest.Ntf.Point,System.Int32,SilkTest.Ntf.ClickType,SilkTest.Ntf.ModifierKeys)
member.summary: Clicks on the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
The coordinates at which to click. The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the image. For clicking the middle of the image use ClickPosition.Center.
Which occurrence of the image should be clicked, if there are multiple occurrences. The first occurrence is 1.
The desired mouse action.
The modifier keys (Alt, Shift, Ctrl) to press while clicking.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.NtfExtensions.ImageClick(SilkTest.Ntf.TestObject,System.String,SilkTest.Ntf.Point,System.Int32,SilkTest.Ntf.ClickType,SilkTest.Ntf.ModifierKeys,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clicks on the specified image.
member.param: a .imageasset file. This file must be an embedded resource in the test assembly.
The coordinates at which to click. The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the image. For clicking the middle of the image use ClickPosition.Center.
Which occurrence of the image should be clicked, if there are multiple occurrences. The first occurrence is 1.
The desired mouse action.
The modifier keys (Alt, Shift, Ctrl) to press while clicking.
Maximum time (in ms) to wait for the image to appear

member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.Silk4NET
member.summary: Handles functionality specific to Visual Studio. Currently provides functionality for verifying assets.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.Silk4NET.VerifyAsset(System.String)
member.summary: Executes a verification asset. Throws a VerificationFailedException if the verification does not pass. Throws an ObjectNotFoundException if the UI object to verify cannot be found.
member.param: The name of the .verification file. The file extension can be omitted.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.Silk4NET.VerifyAsset(SilkTest.Ntf.RemoteAgent,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a verification asset. Throws a VerificationFailedException if the verification does not pass. Throws an ObjectNotFoundException if the UI object to verify cannot be found.
member.param: the agent to be used for this call
The name of the .verification file. The file extension can be omitted.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.Silk4NET.TryVerifyAsset(System.String)
member.summary: Executes a verification asset and returns whether the verification passed. Throws an ObjectNotFoundException if the UI object to verify cannot be found.
member.param: The name of the .verification file. The file extension can be omitted.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.Silk4NET.TryVerifyAsset(SilkTest.Ntf.RemoteAgent,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a verification asset and returns whether the verification passed. Throws an ObjectNotFoundException if the UI object to verify cannot be found.
member.param: the agent to be used for this call
The name of the .verification file. The file extension can be omitted.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.AbstractSilkExtensionClientSide.TestRunFinished(System.Object,Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.Common.TestRunEventArgs)
member.summary: Do not delete, because it will be called via reflection

member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.SilkExtensionClientSide2010
member.summary: This code will be executed in the host process (mstest.exe or Viusal Studio)

member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.SilkExtensionClientSide2012
member.summary: This code will be executed in the host process (vstest.executionengine in mstest.exe or Viusal Studio)

member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Playback_NoImageAsset
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is not a valid image asset..

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Playback_UnknownVerifyAssetError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unknown verification error occurred..

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NET
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_ExpectedException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected exception '{0}' was not thrown..

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_FileDoesNotExist
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to TrueLog file is not available..

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_FolderDoesNotExist
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Folder '{0}' does not exist..

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_MessageDialog_Error
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_MessageDialog_Warning
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Warning.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_Name
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Silk4NET TrueLog.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_NotExecuted
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Not executed.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_ResultHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to TrueLog result:.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_ShowInFolder
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Show in folder.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_ShowResultFolder
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Show result folder.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Resources.Resources.Silk4NETExtension_WrongUnitTestingExtensionVersion
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot create TrueLog result for test execution. Your project was built against the assembly '{0}'. Make sure that tests are executed within a Visual Studio {1} environment..

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.ReflectionUtil.InvokeMethod(System.Object,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes a method via reflection and unpacks possible TargetInvocationExceptions.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.ReflectionUtil.SetProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Writes a property via reflection and unpacks possible TargetInvocationExceptions.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.TrueLogFileNameUtil.GetTrueLogFileNameFromTestRun(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.Common.TestRun)
member.summary: Returns the truelog file name or null if no file name is available

member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.SilkExtensionExecution
member.summary: Entry point for running MS Visual Studio tests that have the "SilkTestClass" attribute

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.SilkExtensionExecution.CreateTrueLogForErrorMessage(System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a truelog file that just contains the given error.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.SilkExtensionExecution.CreateExceptionForIncomptibleUnitTestingExtensionVersion(System.InvalidCastException)
member.summary: For example, an exception occurs if a test is compiled against the 2010 unit testing extension is executed in a 2012 environment (or vice versa) on a machine has both the 2010 and 2012 environment installed. Note: if 2010 tests are executed on a machine that only has the 2012 environment the required assembly dependencies cannot not be loaded and playback will fail immediately (before we get to this code here)

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.SilkExtensionExecution.LogErrorsForTestsThatAreNotRunnable
member.summary: Logs errors for tests that cannot be run (e.g because they have a wrong signature)

member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.TestExecutionEvent
member.summary: Contains enums for test execution callbacks for MS Unit Testing.

member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.VisualStudio.UnitTestingExtension.Keywords.KdtTestDiscoverer
member.summary: Discovers Keyword-driven tests
Notifies the testing framework about the test results.
member.param: Contains the tests
Contains the exception for every test or null if the test passed

member.name: T:SilkTest.Ntf.SilkTestClassAttribute
member.summary: Used to identify classes that contain Silk4NET test methods. During test execution a Silk TrueLog file is written if this attribute is used.

member.name: P:SilkTest.Ntf.SilkTestClassAttribute.ExtensionId
member.summary: Gets the unique ID of the extension.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.SilkTestClassAttribute.GetExecution
member.summary: Returns the TestExtensionExecution object.

member.name: M:SilkTest.Ntf.SilkTestClassAttribute.GetClientSide
member.summary: Returns the ClientSide object.
